My Work

Check out some of my projects...

myTunes Github This is an web page where I showcase my knowledge on how to create a responsive website.
Weather-App Github Weather App is a project I created that allows you to find the temperature, humidity, and conditions of any city in the world. This project shows my ability to use an API to fetch live data.
Weight Converter Github Weight Converter is an app where it converts pounds to grams, kilograms or ounces based on the users input.
Calculator Github Calculator is an app that I created that does all the functions of a calculator.
TicTacToe Github Tic Tac Toe is a single player JavaScript app where I implemented an AI as the opponent.
